cause.description:
Have you ever heard a mother tell her child "Baby, we can't afford for you to get sick..."?
This statement may be heard by 9 million uninsured kids that live in the richest country in the world.
If we stopped funding the war in Iraq for 3 months we could pay to insure all 9 million children with no problem.
Please ask your Trent Lott and Thad Cochran to support and vote for Universal Health care for Kids.
1. Health care is a universal right.
2. Kids should have the right o be sick.
cause.mission: ensure that our elected officials in Mississippi supports the legislation that will provide the health coverage neccessary to grow and thrive.
cause.name: Healthy Child Campaign (Mississippi)
